lead_paragraph: McGINN--Rosemary L. (nee Smith), on June 5, 2016 at home in Breezy Point, Queens. Proud graduate of the St. Mary's Hospital School of Nursing, devoted member of the Golden Age Club and parish choir of St. Thomas More RC. Loving wife of the late Joseph T. McGinn, Sr., MD. Devoted mother of Rosemary, Joseph Jr., MD, William, Maryellen Power, Thomas, MD, Clare Carrubba, and Bryan. Cherished grandmother of 19 and great- grandmother of two. Reposing at Denis S. O'Connor Funeral Home, 91-05 Beach Channel Drive, Rockaway Beach, NY 11693. Viewing Wednesday 7-9pm and Thursday 2-5 and 7-9pm. Funeral Mass Friday 10:00am at St. Thomas More Church in Breezy Point, NY. In lieu of flowers, please donate to The Rockaway Point Volunteer Ambulance Corps Emergency Response System. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MCGINN, ROSEMARY L
